messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] good stories
messages.msgSnippet: music from the Flintstones: (Homer sings as he is driving his car) Simpson, Homer Simpson He s the greatest guy in history From the town of Springfield He s
messages.messageBody:
music from the Flintstones:

(Homer sings as he is driving his car)

"Simpson, Homer Simpson

He's the greatest guy in history

From the town of Springfield

He's about to hit a chestnut tree"

DH, DS and I have been falling off the couch with laughter watching season 4
of the Simpsons. I had forgotten how funny that show was/is.

We have season one as well - first disk is not very funny but the other 2
are alright (not fall-off-the-couch funny, but you can tell they are only
going to get funnier)

looking forward to getting season 5



Cris

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] good stories
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh yes!!  Please, don t joke w/ them... be serious ;-) Barbara Mahalo - May you be in Divine Breath
messages.messageBody:

>Old Town hotel so we'll have people on the inside before next

Oh yes!! Please, don't joke w/ them... be serious ;-)



Barbara

Mahalo - May you be in Divine Breath

messages.subject: good stories
messages.msgSnippet: ... That s sweet. Marty is feeling sick so he s not going to his job today.   He works alone, doing some of the gruntwork of bootmaking for a friend of ours.
messages.messageBody:
> -=-But that evening, she asked to sleep with us.Â  She told
> me, "I've missed a whole day of hugs with you, Mommy. I've got to
> catch up!" :) -=-
>
That's sweet.

Marty is feeling sick so he's not going to his job today. He works alone,
doing some of the gruntwork of bootmaking for a friend of ours. Lately he's
skated down there and taken the bus back, because we're down one car, but
today he just doesn't feel like it.

He's talked about finding another job. Sadie, a homeschooled 20 year old
who's been staying with us, is looking for a restaurant job. I've joked (kind
of joking) about them infiltrating the Albuquerque Old Town hotel so we'll
have people on the inside before next year's conference.

Sandra
